mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(member_email, member_password, member_name, member_age, member_gender) values (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{memberGender})
mapper.select: select id, member_email, member_name, member_age, member_gender from tbl_member where member_email = #{memberEmail} and member_password = #{memberPassword}
